TopicTitle: how do i get this mostroity in orbit with kebin

Moved topic to Gameplay Questions and Tutorials.

Welcome to the forums Doom! I'm afraid we're probably going to need more information before we can answer your question.
we need an image, some info...something

To put a ship in Kerbin orbit with the debug menu, you launch the ship to the launchpad, open the "Cheats" tab, click on "Set Orbit", you set the altitude for your orbit + 600000m (Kerbin's radius) into the Semi-major Axis box, and then you click the "Set Orbit" button. There is a minimum "safe" altitude that it will let you set.
(In fact, the minimum safe altitude is pre-filled in for Kerbin when you open the menu. All you need to do is to press "Set Orbit" without changing anything. )
